Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District No. 1-A -- 9.28 Mills Renewal - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1-A Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1-A (Parishwide) of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of nine and twenty-eight hundredths (9.28) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $779,520 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of giving additional support for the current operation of public schools of said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Tullos -- 1.5% S&U Tax - M&BOA - Perp.
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Tullos, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one and one-half percent (1.5%) (the "Tax"), in perpetuity, commencing January 1, 2020, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Town, all as defined by law (an estimated $65,705 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs of collecting and administering the Tax), to be used for the purpose of maintaining, operating and supporting the sewerage system and waterworks system of the Town and constructing, and acquiring improvements, replacements and extensions for said systems and acquiring, maintaining, operating and replacing equipment, fixtures and accessories for said systems?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 2 -- 5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 2 of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $298,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the hospital buildings and facilities, including equipment, in and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Rogers Nebo Fire District -- 5 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Rogers Nebo Fire District Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Rogers Nebo Fire District of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $60,750 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
